ibis.ipl

Class CapabilitySet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.CapabilitySet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IbisCapabilities, PortType

    public class CapabilitySet
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for the capabilities of an Ibis or a representation of a port type. These are represented as boolean capabilities, its presence indicating that a certain capability is present. There are a number of predefined capabilities, but Ibis implementations may add new ones. A CapabilitySet object is immutable.

      • matchCapabilities

        public boolean matchCapabilities(CapabilitySet capabilitySet)
        Matches the current capabilities with the capabilities supplied. We have a match if the current capabilities are a subset of the specified capabilities.
        Parameters:
        capabilitySet - the capabilities to be matched with.
        Returns:
        true if we have a match, false otherwise.

        Returns:
        the capabilities that start with the specified prefix.

      • unmatchedCapabilities

        public CapabilitySet unmatchedCapabilities(CapabilitySet capabilitySet)
        Matches the current capabilities with the capabilities supplied. Returns a capability set with the unmatched capabilities.
        Parameters:
        capabilitySet - the capabilities to be matched with.
        Returns:
        the capabilities that don't match.
